option_dnslinkRedirect_warning.message: Non usarlo se il tuo nodo IPFS non supporta *.ipfs.localhost. Il reindirizzamento ad un gateway path-based vìola l'isolamento di sicurezza origin-based dei siti web DNSLink, perciò assicurati di comprenderne i relativi rischi.

option_disabledOn_description.message: I siti di questa lista (un nome host per riga) si caricheranno sempre con le integrazioni IPFS disabilitate. option_telemetryGroupTracking_descriptio.description: A description for the 'tracking' grouping of metrics we collect (option_telemetryGroupTracking_description)

recovery_page_title.message: Problem with your IPFS node | IPFS Companion

recovery_page_sub_header.message: Unable to reach your IPFS node :(

recovery_page_message_p1.message: Ensure your IPFS node runs and provides HTTP Gateway.
recovery_page_message_p1.description: Message Para-1 on the recovery screen (recovery_page_message_p1)

recovery_page_message_p2.message: You can also access deserialized version of the requested resource through the preferred public gateway set up in IPFS Companion. This delegates trust to a third-party address below, and skips local hash validation.
recovery_page_message_p2.description: Message Para-2 on the recovery screen (recovery_page_message_p2)

recovery_page_learn_more.description: Learn more link on the recovery screen (recovery_page_learn_more)

recovery_page_update_preferences.description: Learn more link on the recovery screen (recovery_page_learn_more)

request_permissions_page_sub_header.message: Just one more thing to do before you're all set! :)

request_permissions_page_message_p1.message: IPFS Companion needs permission to identify IPFS resources on the web.
request_permissions_page_message_p1.description: Message Para-1 on the recovery screen (recovery_page_message_p1)

request_permissions_page_message_p2.message: The IPFS Companion requires Host permission to access data on all websites. This allows it to inspect all web requests, identify ones for content-addressed IPFS resources, and load them using your local IPFS node. Please click the button below to grant these permissions.
request_permissions_page_message_p2.description: Message Para-2 on the recovery screen (recovery_page_message_p2)

request_permissions_page_learn_more.description: Learn more link on the recovery screen (recovery_page_learn_more)
